original_text: where they got into a boat and set off across the lake for Capernaum. By now it was dark, and Jesus had not yet joined them.
korean_text: 배를 타고 바다를 건너 가버나움으로 가는데 이미 어두웠고 예수는 아직 그들에게 오시지 아니하셨더니

sentences.original_text: where they got into a boat
and set off across the lake
and Jesus had not yet joined them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수님은 아직 그들에게 합류하지 않았다
